doc:
Erika Slezak https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erika_Slezak 0 Erika Alma Hermina Slezak (; born August 5, 1946) is an American actress, best known for her role as Victoria "Viki" Lord on the American daytime soap opera One Life to Live from 1971 through the television finale in 2012 and again in the online revival in 2013. She is one of the longest-serving serial actors in American media. She won a total of six Daytime Emmy Awards for her portrayal of Viki, the most of any daytime drama actress. Erika_Alma_Hermina_Slezak ( ; born August_5_,_1946 ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_role as Victoria_"_Viki_"_Lord on the_American_daytime_soap_opera One_Life to_Live from 1971 through the_television_finale in 2012 and again in the_online_revival in 2013 . She is one of the_longest-serving_serial_actors in American_media . She won a_total of six_Daytime_Emmy_Awards for her_portrayal of Viki , the_most of any_daytime_drama_actress .
